title: Peach of June - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Age Regression   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Charming Protagonist   Curses   Cute Protagonist   Empires   European Ambience   Familial Love   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Honest Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Marriage   Mysterious Past   Nobles   Royalty   Secrets   Time Loop
author: 유폴히
description:
Two lives and two marriages. All failed.

As her third life begins, Leah makes her mind up not to marry again. But this life is strange from the beginning!

Julien, a man who had been cold for a long time, turned into a sweet man. Leah makes a proposal to Julien, who is courting her passionately.

“I don’t know yet whether I want to spend the rest of my life with you or not. But one thing is for sure, I want to sleep with you.”

Juice dripped and his hands became sticky, but he didn’t care. The noon light came into the drawing-room in June’s middle of the day. The sun was shading his face, making it difficult to see his expression. 

White, cold hands carefully peeled off the peach skin and put it directly into my mouth. As I took a bite of the peach, his long fingers lightly touched my lips. I can’t forget that moment.

Leah is getting married to a sweet, pure-hearted man, Julien. What is the secret of Julien, the perfect husband?

An endless love story that begins with a peach given by a friendly summer guest.>
